pr_title: Add initial support for versions search in all storage variants

timeline.message: Add initial support for versions search in all storage variants
Add initial support for versions search in all storage variants

timeline.bodyText:
Perhaps rather set these defaults in REST, so you don't have to do it for every storage.
And let the storage have primitives.
timeline.author: alesj

replies.bodyText: Right, I'll change it for the searchArtifacts operation as well.
replies.author: carlesarnal

timeline.bodyText: I think to add to the suggestion @alesj made - this signature can use int instead of Integer and require the caller to provide non-null values.
timeline.author: EricWittmann
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -240,6 +241,15 @@ default boolean isAlive() {
      */
     public SortedSet<Long> getArtifactVersions(String artifactId) throws ArtifactNotFoundException, RegistryStorageException;
 
+    /**
+     * Fetch the versions of the given artifact
+     * @return the artifact versions, limited
+     * @param artifactId the artifact used to fetch versions
+     * @param limit the result size limit
+     * @param offset the number of versions to skip
+     */
+    public VersionSearchResults searchVersions(String artifactId, Integer offset, Integer limit);

timeline.message: Fix search issues and made some improvements
Change versions search params from Integer to primitive values
